Convert a string containing a date into a Date object.

Parameters:

stringToDate

                                          ConvertDateLocale locale,
                                          java.lang.Boolean withTime)
Convert a string containing a date into a Date object.

Parameters:
dateString - Contains the string that has to be converted in a Date.
locale - Contains which time format is committed in dateString.
withTime - True, if dateString contains time.
Returns:
Converted date
